bs-emoticons-desc: Renders emoticons in a text as images
bs-emoticons-error-validation-missing-sy: Error in line $1: There is no symbol for the image "$2".
bs-emoticons-error-validation-imagename: Error in line $1: The image name "$2" is not valid.
bs-emoticons-error-validation-symbol: Error in line $1: The symbol "$2" is not valid. It has to be between two and ten characters.
